metadata.title: USN-6781-1 -- Spreadsheet::ParseExcel vulnerability
metadata.description: Le Dinh Hai discovered that Spreadsheet::ParseExcel was passing unvalidated  input from a file into a string-type "eval". An attacker could craft a  malicious file to achieve arbitrary code execution.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6781-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libspreadsheet-parseexcel-perl - 0.6500-1ubuntu0.20.04.1 No subscription required
